did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Maurice F. Neufeld Collection of New York Times Clippings, 1929-1978
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Clippings from the New York Times, collected by Maurice F. Neufeld.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor Maurice Frank Neufeld (October 27, 1910 -April 10, 2003) was an American academic, author, union organizer and Army officer. In 1945, he was one of the two founding faculty members of the School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University, appointed by its founding dean, Irving Ives.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Maurice F. Neufeld Collection of New York Times Clippings #5515. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
